mapper.select: SELECT * FROM PRODUCTS WHERE PRODUCT_STATUS='승인대기' AND MEMBER_ID=#{data}
SELECT * FROM PRODUCTS WHERE PRODUCT_STATUS='판매대기' AND MEMBER_ID=#{data}
SELECT * FROM PRODUCTS WHERE PRODUCT_STATUS='판매중' AND MEMBER_ID=#{data}
SELECT * FROM PRODUCTS WHERE PRODUCT_STATUS='품절' AND MEMBER_ID=#{data}
SELECT * FROM PRODUCTS WHERE PRODUCT_STATUS='판매중지' AND MEMBER_ID=#{data}
SELECT * FROM PRODUCTS WHERE PRODUCT_STATUS='판매정지' AND MEMBER_ID=#{data}

SELECT COUNT(CASE WHEN MEMBER_ID=#{data} AND PRODUCT_STATUS='판매대기' THEN 1 END) AS WAIT_SELL_PRODUCT, COUNT(CASE WHEN MEMBER_ID=#{data} AND PRODUCT_STATUS='판매중' THEN 1 END) AS SELLING_PRODUCT, COUNT(CASE WHEN MEMBER_ID=#{data} AND PRODUCT_STATUS='품절' THEN 1 END) AS END_PRODUCT, COUNT(CASE WHEN MEMBER_ID=#{data} AND PRODUCT_STATUS='승인대기' THEN 1 END) AS WAIT_PRODUCT, COUNT(CASE WHEN MEMBER_ID=#{data} AND PRODUCT_STATUS='판매중지' THEN 1 END) AS stop_product, COUNT(CASE WHEN MEMBER_ID=#{data} AND PRODUCT_STATUS='판매정지' THEN 1 END) AS BAN_PRODUCT FROM PRODUCTS
